function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of biological testing with SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Potential exposure and spread of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), and testing in controlled environments","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, PCR testing, and sequencing technologies","People":"Researchers, laboratory workers, and individuals involved in testing","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Disinfection process and handling of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Risk of accidental exposure to SARS-CoV-2 during disinfection process","Mitigation":"Training on proper handling of infectious materials, use of appropriate disinfectants, and strict adherence to biosafety protocols","Technologies":"Disinfectants, biosafety cabinets, and personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Laboratory workers, research technicians, and individuals involved in disinfection","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratory management, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Handling of infectious materials","Impact":"Risk of contamination and accidental exposure to infectious materials","Mitigation":"Training on safe handling procedures, use of appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), and implementation of containment measures","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and decontamination systems","People":"Laboratory workers, research technicians, and individuals involved in handling infectious materials","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratory management, and public health agencies"}]}
